name: df-phl
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cphl, crab(s0, clvec, wsbc(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(cip, cv(s0)), wsbc(s3, cfv(csca, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s3), csr), wral(s4, cv(s1), w3a(wcel(cmpt(s5, cv(s1), co(cv(s5), cv(s2), cv(s4))), co(cv(s0), clmhm, cfv(crglmod, cv(s3)))), wi(wceq(co(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s4)), cfv(c0g, cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s4), cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))), wral(s5, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cfv(cstv, cv(s3)), co(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s5))), co(cv(s5), cv(s2), cv(s4))))))))))))
comment: Define the class of all pre-Hilbert spaces (inner product spaces) over arbitrary fields with involution. (Some textbook definitions are more restrictive and require the field of scalars to be the field of real or complex numbers). (Contributed by NM, 22-Sep-2011.)
